gods.name: Anubis
gods.description: Anubis was the protector of graves and guided souls to the afterlife. He was often depicted as a man with the head of a black jackal.
gods.symbol: Weighing the heart against the feather of truth.

gods.name: Horus
gods.description: Horus was the falcon-headed sky god and protector of the pharaohs. The Eye of Horus symbolized protection, healing, and royal power.
